message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $175. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer of $120. I appreciate your interest in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $155. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $140?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $125. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

Hi Bob, I understand you're willing to go up to $125, but I'm still not comfortable selling it to you at that price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $140 and $125, which would be $132.50. Would you consider that?
I'm willing to meet you halfway between $125 and $140, but I was thinking more along the lines of $132. I'm not willing to go any higher than that. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $132?

Hi Bob, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable selling it to you at $132. I'm willing to consider $135, which is just a bit above your offer. Would you be willing to go up to that price?
